name: Tile Mass Rewriter
description: Causes a tile on the entire area to be converted into another tile.

fields.name: New Tile Value
fields.description: The value of the tile that should replace another.

fields.name: Old Tile Value
fields.description: The value of the tile to be replaced.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable that triggers or activates this tile change.
